fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm upgrade report reflects most recent auto-upgrade runs
fields.request_details:
1. Trigger the scheduled auto-upgrade task (e.g., run the Celery beat schedule or call `python manage.py shell -c "from core.tasks import check_github_updates; check_github_updates.delay()"`).
2. After the task finishes, open the Upgrade Report in the Django admin.
3. Verify the Recent activity table includes a new entry with the timestamp of the triggered run.
4. Confirm the entry appears above the older log lines from previous dates.
